text: Don Poli (foaled 21 April 2009) bought by Gigginstown house stud for €42,000 as a 2 year old, is a Thoroughbred racehorse who competes in National Hunt racing. In 2015, Don Poli ridden by Bryan Cooper and trained by Willie Mullins won the RSA Chase at the Cheltenham Festival. ==References== ==External links== *Sporting Life Profile *Racing Post Profile * Career 1-2-3 Colour Chart – Don Poli Category:2009 racehorse births Category:Cheltenham Festival winners Category:Racehorses trained in Ireland Category:National Hunt racehorses
title: Don Poli
